duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet and assist customers, fill drink orders, and work the drive-thru in a fast-paced food service environment.
Handle cash transactions and process payments efficiently.
Guide the customer experience and interact with each customer that visits the restaurant.
Clean tables, floors, and other areas of the restaurant to maintain cleanliness standards.
Take orders from customers and provide quick and friendly service.
Follow proper safety procedures when handling and preparing food.
Work collaboratively with the team to ensure a smooth and efficient service.
Show up to scheduled shifts on time and work under pressure in a fast-paced environment.
